sources.title: Cook County Sheriff — Eviction Procedure (Plaintiff's Guide)
Cook County Sheriff — Eviction Procedure (Tenant's/Defendant's Guide)
Illinois Legal Aid Online — Understanding eviction (tenant)

statements.text: In Cook County, the Cook County Sheriff is the only entity that may physically evict a tenant from a residence (with a court order).
statements.notes: Landlords cannot perform 'self-help' evictions (e.g., changing locks or using force).
